import"core-js/modules/es.string.replace.js";/*!
 * Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */ // fix until babel-plugin-univeral-import changes go in...
export const fixChunkName=args=>{let actualChunkName=args.chunkName();// do we have 'the bug' in our named chunk? we can tell because id naming via babel plugin has the same issue
const matches=/[._]/.exec(args.id);const replaceRegEx=/[./_]/gi;// if we have a match, should be this..
if(matches){actualChunkName=actualChunkName.substr(0,matches.index).concat(actualChunkName.substr(matches.index).replace(replaceRegEx,'-'));}else{actualChunkName=args.id.concat(actualChunkName.substr(args.id.length).replace(replaceRegEx,'-'));}return actualChunkName;};export const getDefaultOrResult=obj=>obj&&obj.default?obj.default:obj;
